---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version: 1.0.2
Date: 2020-10-16
  Changes:
    - Changed how I capture the rotation action of the concrete to be able to cycle through all the colours.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version: 1.0.0
Date: 2020-10-12
  Changes:
    - Rotating coloured "plascrete" changes its color to one of the next 3 in the sequence below.   Tile are limited to 4x directions.
      -  plascrete-red --> plascrete-green
      -  plascrete-green --> plascrete-blue
      -  plascrete-blue --> plascrete-orange
      -  plascrete-orange --> plascrete-yellow
      -  plascrete-yellow --> plascrete-pink
      -  plascrete-pink --> plascrete-purple
      -  plascrete-purple --> plascrete-brown
      -  plascrete-brown --> plascrete-cyan
      -  plascrete-cyan --> plascrete-acid
      -  plascrete-acid --> plascrete-red
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version: 0.0.1
Date: 2020-03-
  Features:
    - First release
